title: Cheakamus River - Upper
whats_it_like: Classic. Continuous river running at its finest.

difficulty.text: IV at 2.5, continuous.  Gets harder as levels rise.

scouting_portaging: Easy to moderate - good boat scouting skills will make things go much faster.

time.original: 1.5 hours if you really take your time.  A casual 20 minutes when it's familiar.

when_to_go: Long season - spring, summer and fall.
